QUESTION.TITLE: Which is true about CGI Programs
QUESTION.ANSWER: They are run in different threads in the web server.
Are embeded in the web server.
They do not crash the web server process.

QUESTION.TITLE: Which is true about Java Servlets
QUESTION.ANSWER: They are run in a single process.
Can be run on multiple processes.
Have security and error handling features.

QUESTION.TITLE: What is the function of the HTTP protocol?
QUESTION.ANSWER: Transfer data between a client and a server.
Optimize network communications between a client and a server.
